answers.answer: To check if you have gestational diabetes & yes as long as your preggo , everyone has to test for it .

Its a blood test that they do to check to see if you have gestational diabetes. Everyone has to take it. They give you a sugary drink and you have to drink it within 5 minutes, then after an hour they draw your blood. The drink can make you sick though, it made me very sick!
Yes you have to take it when pregnant:/ and it can make you sick^ i was gonna throw up when i took mine last week.
Drink lots of water in the days before ur test so u can hopefully pass I failed n have to take a 3hr one n I got really sick with the 1hr test  so I'm nervous
At what week do you take it?
Ill be 29 weeks when I take mine.

I think u take the test between 27 wks and 32wks. Some ppl are advise to take the test if they are over weight. I have mine in a couple of wks cause my granda has diabetes. No food or drink from 10pm the following night.

I get my test next week. I'll be 25 weeks. Its usually between 25-28 weeks. Usually. Most places will so it between those weeks. Some do it later. But take something to eat with you. For after the test. My first time i took peauutbutter and banana sandwiches with me and thy helped so much after the test. I felt super sick during the test it was ridiculous!!  Good luck!

question: What is it and does everyone have to do it?
title: glucose test
